name: Syrian Human Rights Council(
goal:
Syrian Human Rights Council(SHRC)
The Syrian Human Rights Council is a national council responsible for
strengthening the promotion and protection of human rights into the
country and for addressing situations of human rights violations and
make recommendations on them. It has the ability to discuss all
thematic human rights issues and situations that require its attention
throughout the year and the Syrian Human Rights Council(SHRC) supports
the ten principles of the UN Global Compact with respect to human
rights, labour, environment, and anti-corruption.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Public Health, Research and innovation
